item.description:
Our monthly Concord video screening is on the 3rd Tuesday every month. We'll pick our video tonight at the bookstore. Come on over and select what you'd like to see.

Our collection includes a selection of classic 9/11 videos as well as documentaries about some of the biggest issues of our time.

Come on out to our regular meeting and share your DVD collection with our other members, as well.

----------

We gather at 6:30 at Liberty Books and Comics in Concord and start our video screening at 7. Coffee, tea and popcorn are usually available, but please bring snacks and drinks to share with others, as well.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the meeting room in the back.
item.name: Concord - viewers' choice
